description:
Elevation gain: 200 meters

Route:  Old Railway bed & trail 

Features: Old growth and second growth forest, picnic benches and tables along the route with views of the lake along the trail.
directions: The trail is accessible from Hayward Street, which is off of Highway # 7 in Silverdale (west of Mission). The northern and southern side of the Hayward Dam or by Dewdney Trunk Road at Stave Dam is where the trails commence.
title: Hayward Reservoir Trail
